problem_text_cn: 如图,AD∥BE∥CF,直线l_{1}、l_{2}与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F．若AB=1,BC=2,DE=1.5,则EF的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AD ∥ BE ∥ CF, straight lines l_{N_0}, l_{N_1} and these three parallel lines intersect at points A, B, C and points D, E, and F respectively. If AB = N_2, BC = N_3, DE = N_4, then the length of EF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵AD∥BE∥CF,直线l_{1}、l_{2}与这三条平行线分别交于点A、B、C和点D、E、F,∴\frac{AB}{BC}=\frac{DE}{EF},即:\frac{1}{2}=\frac{1.5}{EF}∴EF=3故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行线分线段成比例定理,解题的关键是理解该定理的意义．
